text.en: Magical dance of the wisdom of the victorious ones of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé yeshe dzutrul gar

text.en: Manifesting in the form of a Śrī Heruka,
Protector of beings to be trained and supreme progenitor of siddhas—
Kunga Lekpa, at your feet I pray:
text.en-trans: künga lekpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire me to liberate dualistic perception into the dharmatā expanse
text.en-trans: zungdzin nangwa chönyi long drol né

text.en: And remain inseparable from you, the guru.
text.en-trans: lama khyé dang yermé jingyi lob
